---
title: Overview of Cartilage
---


# Types

- Articular (Hyaline) Cartilage
- Fibrocartilage

# Remodeling

Cartilage remodels in response to mechanical demands.

:::{layout-ncol="2"}
### Reduced stress (immobilization):

- Decreased mass
- Decreased volume
- Decreased strength

### Increased stress (exercise)

- Increased mass
- Increased volume
- Increased strength
:::
